page.title: 17CREDITS
page.content: This survey for the Domesday Project was undertaken by the Inwardleigh Women's Institute. The editing was performed by Truda Bird <with assistance of husband> and contributions were obtained from other members and local residents. The photographs were taken by Norman Bird. Pages which are mainly or entirely the work of others are credited as follows:- page 9 - Sue Butters, page 15 - Ann Vallence and page 16 - Debbie Hosegood. The assistance of many others is acknowledged especially Sheila Vallence, Roy and Rosemary Banbury and Ken Harris.
